arts.ttl: Steve McManaman makes bold Liverpool title prediction - 'Of course they will'
arts.sum: Liverpool have opened up a five point lead at the Premier League summit as a result of their impressive start to the season under Arne Slot - and they've been backed to stay there

arts.ttl: Arsenal and Liverpool have 20-year-old Bundesliga prodigy on their radar
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt midfielder Hugo Larsson is a player in demand and multiple Premier League clubs are keeping tabs on him. According to Florian Plettenberg, Arsenal, Liverpool and Tottenham Hotspur have the player on their radar and they will face competition from top Bundesliga clubs as well. The 20-year-old midfielder is regarded as one of the […] The post Arsenal and Liverpool have 20-year-old Bundesliga prodigy on their radar appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery confirms another Aston Villa injury concern on top of Jacob Ramsey update
arts.sum: Unai Emery confirmed Jacob Ramsey suffered a hamstring injury in Aston Villa's defeat against Liverpool, while Boubacar Kamara felt something late on. Ramsey was replaced just before half-time by John McGinn after suffering his hamstring injury, while Lucas Digne has also picked up an issue but was able to continue deep into the second period.

arts.ttl: How Liverpool exploited 'oceans of space' against Villa
arts.sum: Match of the Day's Micah Richards and Alan Shearer look at how Liverpool broke to exploit space left by Aston Villa, who lost 2-0 at Anfield.

arts.ttl: 'Now we are candidates' - classy Liverpool take early title control
arts.sum: Liverpool have taken early control of the Premier League title race, but Alexis Mac Allister says he didn't think they would be contenders at the start of the season.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah achieves major European landmark in Liverpool win over Aston Villa
arts.sum: Liverpool's Mohamed Salah becomes the first player in Europe's big five leagues to hit 10 goals and 10 assists this season in the Reds' 2-0 win over Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-0 Aston Villa (9 de Nov., 2024) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Liverpool offer ‘serious’ injury update on Trent Alexander-Arnold
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold went off in the first half of Liverpool’s 2-0 win over Aston villa

arts.ttl: Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister makes telling title admission after Aston Villa win
arts.sum: Liverpool are five points clear at the top of the Premier League table following their 2-0 win over Aston Villa - and Alexis Mac Allister is excited by how it's going

arts.ttl: Unai Emery makes admission about Aston Villa players' 'performance level' after Liverpool defeat
arts.sum: Unai Emery is confident Aston Villa will return to the level they showed last season after suffering consecutive Premier League defeats for the first time in 18 months by losing to Liverpool 2-0 at Anfield. Join our Aston Villa WhatsApp group and get the latest breaking news, interviews and opinion sent straight to your phone, plus matchday team news and live updates of all the action.
